title: Types of Sampling: Turn the Lights on
question_text: A town committee is thinking about investing $ 200 , 000 $ 200 , 000 for lighting the baseball fields.   The first selectman of the town wants to survey 500 citizens 500 citizens of the town to see what they think.   Which of the following will produce a simple random sample?

choices.text: Surveying every fourth citizen who walks by the town hall.
Randomly selecting 500 citizens 500 citizens from the local phone directory.
Using the latest census data from the town, numbering the citizens, and using a random number generator to select 500 citizens 500 citizens .
